name: 吳傳威
objective: This course aims at analyzing indeterminate structures using force methods as well as deformation methods. It major contents include: (1)Strain energies and complementary strain energies and energy theorems, (2)Conjugate beam method, (3)Consistent deformation method, (4) Least work method, (5)Slope deflection method, and (6)Moment distribution method.
schedule:
1st week Orientation and introduction
2nd week Work, eigen work and displacement work
3rd week Elastic strain energy
4th week Energy theorems – Work equation
5th week Castigliano’s theorems, unit load method
6th week Non-uniform sections, polar coordinates 
7th week Indeterminate beams and frames
8th week Force methods -The conjugate beam method
9th week Force methods -The consistent deformation method
10th week Midterm examination
11h week Force methods -The least work method
12th week Slope deflection method
13th week Slope deflection equation, side-sway
14th week Slope deflection method – with side-sway
15th week Moment distribution method – with no side-sway
16th week Moment distribution method – with side-sway
17th week Moment distribution method – settlements and deformed
18th week Final examination
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm Ex.  　　   25%
2. Quiz(twice)　　   15%
3. Homework          15%
4. Class attendance  10%
5. Final Ex.         35%
materials:
1.Elementary Theory of Structures,Y.Y.Hsien
2.Structural Analysis,4th edition, R.C.Hibbeler,Prentice Hall.
3.Class note.
